name: Revenge on BAD GUY
description:
I got dumped! What's not good about me?

Make him regret dumping me!
Exciting two-choice game is HERE !

How to play
・Read the question
・Check the picture and choices.
・Make your choice
・If you choose the right one, you will see a happy ending!！
・If you choose the wrong one, you will see a tragic ending…！
・You could try again even if failed！

Recommended for！
・Want to get revenge on ex-boyfriend
・Want to fight back

EU / California users can opt-out under GDPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
